title: I need help
body:
So lets start 4 weeks ago I was on 350 to 400 fps never went lower than 300 now I'm dropping to 7 fps whenever someone enters or leaves fog of war 

I do not want anyone saying stuff like well I play on 20 fps I don't care I just need to know if this is a bug so more then 1 player or just me I have reinstalled 2 times tried to repair ect ect if anyone knows please tell me

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you run through the [Low FPS Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for me, let me know if anything helps.

I did all of that I keep my system in good condition I'm stumped as I'm playing the new battlefield game at 70 fps and not 1 time did I drop below 60 fps so yer it's just league that's dropinging in frames.
